IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE PROGRAM AND SUPERVISORY MANAGEMENT TO LOW-INCOME HOUSING PROPERTIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: DEDICATED TO THE CREATION AND PRESERVATION OF QUALITY AFFORDABLE HOUSING THROUGHOUT THE UNITED STATES FOR THE ELDERLY, FAMILIES AND PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES.
IRS990.Desc: TO BE A RELIABLE SOURCE OF CAPITAL AND DEVELOPMENT EXPERTISE FOR AFFORDABLE HOUSING AND PROGRAM AND SUPERVISORY MANAGEMENT OF LOW-INCOME HOUSING PROPERTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PART X - OTHER LIABILITIES MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADEQUATELY ADDRESSED ALL RELEVANT TAX POSITIONS AND THAT THERE ARE NO UNRECORDED TAX LIABILITIES.

UNDER THE ORGANIZATION'S WELLNESS PROGRAM, EMPLOYEES ARE ELIGIBLE TO SUBMIT WITH SUBSTANTIATION FOR REIMBURSEMENT OF MEMBERSHIP TO A QUALIFYING WELLNESS PROGRAM UP TO A MAXIMUM OF $500. THE VALUE OF THIS BENEFIT IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND REPORTED ON THE EMPLOYEE'S W-2.

A PERCENTAGE OF THE EMPLOYEES LISTED ON PART VII (CEO, CFO AND VICE PRESIDENTS), TOTAL COMPENSATION IS BASED ON ACHIEVING BOARD-DIRECTED GOALS THAT INCLUDE SPECIFIC PRODUCTION LEVELS AND NET INCOME TO THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STEWARDS OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING FOR THE FUTURE ("SAHF") IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF NAHT UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30, 2020. EFFECTIVE SEPTEMBER 30, 2020, LOW INCOME INVESTMENT FUND ("LIIF") ACQUIRED A CONTROLLING MEMBERSHIP INTEREST IN NAHT, RENAMED THE "CLASS A" MEMBERSHIP INTERESTS, AND SAHF DECREASED THEIR MEMBERSHIP INTEREST IN NAHT TO A NONCONTROLLING INTEREST, RENAMED THE "CLASS B" MEMBERSHIP INTERESTS, PER THE RESTRUCTURING AGREEMENT. SAHF IS A 501(C)3 ORGANIZATION COMPRISED OF 13 NON-PROFIT MEMBER ORGANIZATIONS DEDICATED TO THE CREATION OR PRESERVATION OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING IN THE UNITED STATES. LIIF IS A 501(C)3 CDFI ORGANIZATION DEDICATED TO PROVIDING A COMPREHENSIVE RANGE OF PROGRAMS TO INCREASE THE AVAILABILITY OF CAPITAL IN LOW INCOME COMMUNITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE NATIONAL AFFORDABLE HOUSING TRUST'S ("NAHT") GOVERNING BOARD IS COMPRISED OF A TOTAL OF 7 DIRECTORS. UP TO 3 OF THESE DIRECTORS ARE NOMINATED BY SAHF. SAHF ELECTS THE DIRECTORS FROM NOMINEES PROVIDED BY ITS MEMBERS ORGANIZATIONS AND ONE DIRECTOR IS AN OFFICER OF SAHF. UP TO 4 DIRECTORS ARE NOMINATED BY LIIF. LIIF ELECTS THE DIRECTORS FROM PROVIDED NOMINEES AND THREE DIRECTORS ARE CURRENTLY OFFICERS OF LIIF.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT CPA FIRM AND REVIEWED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX ACCOUNTANT. UPON COMPLETION THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE INTERIM DIRECTOR OF ADMINISTRATION AND FINANCE AND ONE OTHER OFFICER BEFORE BEING FILED. THE 990 IS ALSO MADE AVAILABLE TO THE GOVERNING BOARD FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE POLICY REQUIRES AN ANNUAL DECLARATION BE SIGNED BY OFFICERS, DIRECTORS AND KEY STAFF. MANAGEMENT MONITORS THAT DECLARATIONS ARE SIGNED ANNUALLY AND REPORTS ANY NONCOMPLIANCE TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN 2023, THE ORGANIZATION CONTRACTED WITH A COMPENSATION CONSULTANT TO CONDUCT A REVIEW OF MARKET COMPENSATION BENCHMARKS FOR ALL POSITIONS. THE STUDY INCLUDED ANALYSES OF SALARY AND TOTAL CASH COMPENSATION, MARKET INFORMATION, RANGES FOR EACH POSITION AND A RECOMMENDED SALARY REVIEW PROCESS. WE CONDUCT ANNUAL PERFORMANCE AND SALARY REVIEWS FOR ALL EMPLOYEES. OUR MANAGERS FOLLOW THE SALARY REVIEW PROCESS. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS CONDUCTS AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF THE CEO, BASED ON AGREED-UPON OBJECTIVES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S POLICY IS TO PROVIDE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND TAX RETURNS TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS A PUBLIC WEBSITE WITH CONTACT INFORMATION AVAILABLE FOR MAKING THE REQUESTS OR THEY CAN BE MADE IN PERSON AT THE ORGANIZATION'S BUSINESS ADDRESS.
DOUGLAS P. BATES, CFO & TREASURER, IS NO LONGER AN EMPLOYEE AND/OR OFFICER OF NAHT EFFECTIVE NOVEMBER 10, 2023.
NATIONAL AFFORDABLE HOUSING TRUST ("NAHT") DID NOT CHANGE THEIR OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.
